graph_title: 선진국에 의해 부과되는 평균 관세(상품 유형별)
indicator_name: 개도국, 최빈개도국 및 군소도서 개발국에 부과되는 가중 관세 평균
target_name: 최빈개도국 수입품에 대한 특혜 원산지규정 투명성 및 명료성을 포함하여 최빈개도국의 무관세 및 수량규제 없는 시장접근에 대한 WTO 결정을 시의성있게 이행

en.title: Average tariffs faced by developing countries, least developed countries and small island developing States
en.graph_title: Average tariff applied by developed countries, by type of product
en.indicator_name: Weighted average tariffs faced by developing countries, least developed countries and small island developing States
en.target: Realize timely implementation of duty-free and quota-free market access on a lasting basis for all least developed countries, consistent with World Trade Organization decisions, including by ensuring that preferential rules of origin applicable to imports from least developed countries are transparent and simple, and contribute to facilitating market access
en.goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 468kB)
en.page_content: ▶ Data type: Estimated data by international organizations (Type2) This is Korean data prepared by international organizations through estimation and modeling. If there are no national data corresponding to UN SDGs indicators, international data are available for monitoring.
